architectural_elements.name: High Vaulted Ceiling
architectural_elements.description: Ornate, decaying ceiling with peeling gold leaf, cracks, and possibly a fresco or mural.

architectural_elements.name: Grand Windows
architectural_elements.description: Tall, arched windows with broken or stained glass, allowing eerie moonlight to filter in.

architectural_elements.name: Marble or Wooden Flooring
architectural_elements.description: Cracked marble or warped wooden floors, scattered with dust, leaves, or debris.

architectural_elements.name: Balcony or Mezzanine
architectural_elements.description: A second-level balcony overlooking the hall, with a rusted or broken railing.

architectural_elements.name: Grand Entrance Doors
architectural_elements.description: Massive double doors, slightly ajar or creaking, with tarnished handles.

furniture_and_decor.name: Ballroom Chairs
furniture_and_decor.description: Antique chairs lined along the walls, some broken or covered in dust.

furniture_and_decor.name: Ornate Tables
furniture_and_decor.description: Small, decorative tables with candelabras, half-melted candles, or ghostly place settings.

furniture_and_decor.name: Grand Piano
furniture_and_decor.description: A decaying piano, possibly playing eerie tunes by itself or covered in cobwebs.

furniture_and_decor.name: Chandeliers
furniture_and_decor.description: Large, flickering chandeliers with missing crystals or broken bulbs, swaying slightly.

furniture_and_decor.name: Wall Mirrors
furniture_and_decor.description: Full-length mirrors with gilded frames, some cracked or showing ghostly reflections.

atmospheric_details.name: Cobwebs
atmospheric_details.description: Thick cobwebs draped across corners, furniture, and chandeliers.

atmospheric_details.name: Dust Particles
atmospheric_details.description: Floating in the air, visible in shafts of light or moonlight.

atmospheric_details.name: Flickering Lights
atmospheric_details.description: Candles, sconces, or chandeliers that flicker unpredictably, casting shifting shadows.

atmospheric_details.name: Ghostly Figures
atmospheric_details.description: Translucent figures dancing or standing in the distance, disappearing when approached.

atmospheric_details.name: Echoing Sounds
atmospheric_details.description: Faint music, laughter, or whispers that seem to come from nowhere.

interactive_objects.name: Sheet Music
interactive_objects.description: Yellowed sheet music on the piano, possibly revealing a clue or playing a haunting melody.

interactive_objects.name: Broken Pocket Watch
interactive_objects.description: A small, intricate pocket watch left on a table, tied to a puzzle or time-based event.

interactive_objects.name: Guest Book
interactive_objects.description: An old, leather-bound book with names of past guests, some pages torn or bloodstained.

interactive_objects.name: Hidden Compartment
interactive_objects.description: A secret panel or drawer in the wall, containing a key, letter, or other important item.

environmental_effects.name: Drafts
environmental_effects.description: Curtains or tablecloths gently moving as if pushed by an unseen force.

environmental_effects.name: Fog
environmental_effects.description: A thin layer of mist near the floor, adding to the eerie atmosphere.

environmental_effects.name: Bloodstains or Scorch Marks
environmental_effects.description: Mysterious stains or marks on the floor, hinting at past violence or supernatural events.

environmental_effects.name: Falling Petals or Leaves
environmental_effects.description: Decaying petals or leaves drifting down from the ceiling or balcony.

lighting.name: Moonlight
lighting.description: Streaming through broken windows, casting long, eerie shadows.

lighting.name: Candlelight
lighting.description: Flickering candles on tables, sconces, or the floor, creating a ghostly ambiance.

lighting.name: Shadow Play
lighting.description: Shadows that move unnaturally or form ominous shapes on the walls and floor.
